title: What's in a spider web (observing animals)
creator_credit: Goldberg-Werrenrath Productions and Reinald Werrenrath Jr
brief_description: Notes the difference between spiders and insects, the various methods spiders have of weaving webs, their methods of trapping prey, and the laying of eggs. From the series “Science fact and fun series”.
description: Notes the difference between spiders and insects, the various methods spiders have of weaving webs, their methods of trapping prey, and the laying of eggs. From the series “Science fact and fun series”.
